name: hall-of-shame-ext
val: In front of the building’s Art Deco rotunda and towering curved facade, a media circus of paparazzi, reporters and fans gather behind barricades.
The steps of the Hall of Justice

name: monocorp-tower-ext
val: The awe-inspiring MONOCORP Tower is a 91-story, golden, art deco tapered obelisk. On the building’s illuminated ornamental CROWN, a giant four-sided jumbotron video screen broadcasts a montage of Monocorp products.

name: monocorp-penthouse
val: Monocorp’s penthouse media center overlooks the city. CIGARETTE SMOKE wafts in the air. a raised stage surrounded by video screens
